item.title: NORTHERN TECHNOLOGIES INTERNATIONAL CORP 10-K
item.description: NORTHERN TECHNOLOGIES INTERNATIONAL CORP, which is in the Coating, Engraving & Allied Services [3470] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 15, 2022 had 36189 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: ntic - 1441 instances joint - 473 instances products - 343 instances ventures - 339 instances 2022 - 323 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
